channel.title: Comments on: Free Jeffrey A Carver Science Fiction E-books

item.title: By: Laurence
item.dc:creator: Laurence
item.description: Nebula Award finalist Jeffrey A. Carver talked with me about the very cool reason he's giving away free ebooks. You can read the interview on SciFiBookshelf.com
item.content:encoded: Nebula Award finalist Jeffrey A. Carver talked with me about the very cool reason he’s giving away free ebooks. You can read the interview on SciFiBookshelf.com
